bibl.title: Letter from Orestes A.B. Senter to Howard A. Kelly, July 15, 1907

div1.p: Senter sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Orestes A.B. Senter to Howard A. Kelly, July 15, 1907
div1.opener:
ans
Orestes A. B. Senter
69 Franklin Park West,
Columbus, Ohio.
July 15. 1907.
Mr Howard A. Kelley
1418 Eutaw Place
Baltimore Maryland
$5
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
Enclosed please find
Post office money order for
five dollars to apply to the
relief of Comrade John R.
Kissinger, whose circumstances
were made known by the
“Outlook” of June 29, 1907.

I am sorry not to send more
but this is a part of my first
pension check under the act of
Feby 6, 1907.
div1.closer: Respectfully Yours Orestes A. B. Senter of McCoy Post No 1. Ohio. G. A. R.
